episodes.title: Daystar Scandal: "Pete's" Polygraph Examiner Speaks
episodes.description:
“Overly dramatic” is how a polygraph examiner described Daystar’s Lamb family. 

In this exclusive release, we’re sharing a phone call with the man who conducted a polygraph on “Pete.”. The conversation took place in December 2024, during the height of the scandal involving Daystar Television Network. Part of the shocking claims included allegations that “Pete” SA’d a child in the Lamb family. 

This call is being released now—months after it happened—because the investigation has concluded. Last week, the Colleyville Police Department announced the case was closed. No charges were filed, but the case could be reopened if new information comes to light. 

In this call, retired Mansfield, TX police officer Ralph Standefer answers questions about “Pete’s” polygraph, some of which have been widely speculated about on social media. 

*** Any comments that disclose the identify of the child will be deleted.***

episodes.title: Daystar Board Meeting: New Recording Released
episodes.description:
There is a lot to unpack in a secret recording from a Daystar board meeting that has not previously been released and contains new details. Among them:
- Doug Weiss' polygraph, in which he was asked a blunt question about Joni Lamb.
- How Joni confronted Marcus Lamb about his lengthy affair with an employee, and how he reacted.
- Whether Doug Weiss counseled Marcus and Joni through their marital challenges.
- Anna Kendall's ("Red Wig") impression when she met Doug's former wife, Lisa. 
- Why God "clapped His hands" at Joni Lamb.

This recording is from an emergency board meeting held on August 29, 2023. The purpose of the meeting was to discuss how to publicly address the absence of Jonathan and Suzy Lamb from Daystar's program, Ministry Now. Board chair Joni Lamb and board members Arnold Torres and Jonathan Lamb were in attendance in person. Board member Tom Calender participated earlier in the meeting by phone to discuss Jonathan and Suzy's situation, but hung up before this lengthy portion of the conversation.

episodes.title: Daystar Scandal: Donations & Denials
episodes.description:
A longtime donor asked Daystar Television Network for her money back. The answer was no, but not before a lengthy email response blasted Jonathan Lamb as having a "corrupt spirit of greed" and stated that police concluded their investigation into a child's SA. Find out if that is true in this short video.

To read the article on the donor's request, visit The Roys Report: https://julieroys.com/embattled-daystar-tv-refuses-to-refund-donations-says-jonathan-lamb-has-corrupt-spirit-of-greed-and-power/

episodes.title: Dishing with the Dead at Daystar
episodes.description:
Do you believe dead people can communicate with the living? Daystar Television Network, a Christian broadcasting ministry, apparently thinks so. 

Deceased spouses have communicated with people who talked about the experience. Joni Lamb recalls hearing from her husband, Marcus, who passed away in 2021. A recent guest had a visitation from her future husband’s dead wife. 

Is speaking with the dead scriptural? Watch the video and leave your comments.

episodes.title: Where is Janice Smith? [Marcus Lamb's Mistress]
episodes.description:
Daystar Television Network is no stranger to scandal. The founder of the Christian network had a seven year affair with employee Janice Smith.  It shocked followers years ago and now that illicit relationship is taking social media by storm. The reason? The whistleblower has come forward  to talk about the epic fallout publicly for the first time. 

Marcus Lamb‘s mistress, Janice Smith, vanished. No one seemed to know what happened to her after she was banished from Daystar because of the illicit relationship.  

We found Janice Smith and will reveal details in this video about her life after the scandal.  

Be sure to watch the entire video and leave comments. 

Other must-see videos: a deep dive into the hot mess at Daystar Television Network: Breaking the Silence of the Lambs

episodes.title: Joni Lamb: Let's Talk About Sex
episodes.description:
Joni Lamb, the president of Daystar Television Network, has denied sexting with divorced sex therapist Doug Weiss during their romance. However, in an audio clip that hasn't been released until now,  Joni admits reading racy texts from Doug to her daughter-in-law,  Suzy Lamb. The contents of those texts were troubling enough for Suzy to seek pastoral counsel over them.

Additionally, former family friend Denise Boggs was shocked by something Joni Lamb said her betrothed told her.  Finally, preacher and friend Rodney Howard-Browne raised a stink about whether sexting was going on between the sexagenarians. 

Lord, have mercy! 👀

episodes.title: “If Anything Happens…” Marcus Lamb’s Final Wishes Email
episodes.description:
“It is mine and Joni's desire that our children are always involved as the leadership of Daystar.”

Marcus Lamb, the founder of Daystar Television Network, left specific instructions about the future of the network and who should carry on his legacy after his death. 

A recently-obtained email outlines his plans in great detail. 

An in-depth report on the Daystar scandal with this information and more can be found here: 

https://youtu.be/Ln5Jlu5TlaU?si=6XzugS7doCeTzsOI

episodes.title: Breaking the Silence of the Lambs [Inside the Daystar Scandal]
episodes.description:
There is no longer silence of the Lambs in a shocking scandal at 
Daystar, the second-largest Christian broadcasting network in the country. 

Marcus Lamb, the founder of Daystar, left specific instructions about the future of the network and who should carry on his legacy after his death. The Christian broadcasting dynasty has been embroiled in a public family feud since his passing and the remarriage of his wealthy widow.  

The Lamb family feud has blown up on social media and involves allegations of a SA coverup, misuse of ministry funds, and a family brawl over whether Joni Lamb’s marriage to divorced sex therapist Doug Weiss is biblical...or not.

Here are links to background articles: 
http://jenesisproductions.com/2024/05/17/the-unsilence-of-the-lambs/

http://jenesisproductions.com/2024/06/08/fifty-shades-of-dr-doug/

http://jenesisproductions.com/2024/06/27/the-truth-shall-set-you-free/

episodes.title: Inside Daystar: the Bible vs the Boardroom
episodes.description:
The public battle between Joni Lamb and her son and daughter-in-law started over their refusal to read a viewer comment praising her new husband during a live broadcast in July 2023. Jonathan and Suzy Lamb opposed the marriage of Daystar’s CEO to divorced sex therapist Doug Weiss on biblical principles. The couple was immediately removed from Ministry Now and Suzy was fired. Jonathan was demoted and eventually terminated, too. Did Daystar violate the couple's religious rights?

An audio recording of a board meeting on November 16, 2023 raises questions about whether Daystar backpedaled on those disciplinary actions. The Civil Rights Act prohibits religious discrimination in the workplace. Attorney John Lynch told Jonathan Lamb he had no legal claim, but Lynch and the board members reversed their position about Jonathan having to submit, and decided he did not have to read anything that violated his religious beliefs. Board members Tom Calender and Arnold Torres also spoke during the meeting. 

What do you think? Did Daystar change its mind because of potential legal issues? Was it a C.Y.A. move?

episodes.title: Daystar Scandal: "Get Past it or Resign"
episodes.description: Jonathan Lamb wasn't given many options by Daystar's board of directors, lead by his mother, Joni Lamb. However, the comments in this video take the ultimatum he was given to a new level. Jonathan raised concerns over comments made by Joni Lamb about the SA of his child. Daystar's attorney John Lynch told him, "You either get past it or you need to resign."

episodes.title: Joni Lamb: "Let's Just Say That I Married Out of The Will of God..."
episodes.description:
There has been much controversy about the marriage of Daystar's Joni Lamb and divorced sex therapist & marriage counselor Doug Weiss. In this video, Joni Lamb opines before Daystar's board of directors and Jonathan Lamb what the consequences would be if they married out of God's will. 

She also answers Jonathan's question about whether she is happier now that she was with his father, Marcus Lamb.

episodes.title: Did Joni Lamb Cast a Spell on Live TV?
episodes.description:
Daystar's Joni Lamb is raising eyebrows with a "prophetic prayer" that is being compared to casting a spell or a curse. 

 She read during a live broadcast of Ministry Now on February 19, 2025, while husband Doug Weiss repeated after her. The prayer from a trusted "prophetic voice" sounded a lot like a curse, calling for suffering, blindness, etc., to punish  enemies. Apostle Kathryn Krick was a guest also recited the prayer/curse. 

It certainly wasn't the type of prayer viewers would expect to hear on worldwide Christian television, especially a network that has a highly-promoted prayer line. 

I accepted the invitation to call the prayer line and we focused on the situation at Daystar. The conversation is included in the video.

episodes.title: Joni Lamb: The Lord Told Me...
episodes.description:
Daystar's Joni Lamb heard from the Lord again and reveals what He told her in this video. Also, some namedropping of famous leaders in the ministry wold as she recites a list of big names who supported her marriage to divorced sex therapist Doug Weiss. However, three of the people Joni Lamb said approved of the marriage and gave their blessing have since left Daystar Television Network.

Doug Weiss also claims support from Andrew Wommack, Paula White, James Robison and Jesse Duplantis in this video: https://youtu.be/uJN1Va36MEA?si=lRyeEsOIdV9Vz7dC

episodes.title: Jonathan Lamb's Letter
episodes.description:
“I’m happier now than I’ve ever been.”

That was Joni Lamb’s reaction after her son, Jonathan, read an impassioned letter at a Daystar board meeting. Jonathan wrote the letter in response to an email from Daystar attorney John Lynch. In it, Jonathan revealed that Joni scolded Suzy Lamb over the SA of a child during a meeting with Jimmy Evans. Jonathan said the couple was ordered to submit and not talk about the incident. 

The couple refused to read a viewer comment on air that complimented Joni’s new husband, Doug Weiss. That kicked off a firestorm that played out publicly when they were kicked off Ministry Now. More about that in this video:  https://youtu.be/RUFWsWAx0x4?si=pWjLp_W67OfEqiX4

Were Jonathan and Suzy Lamb fired because of poor job performance or was it retaliation for not endorsing the marriage of Joni Lamb to recently divorced sex therapist Doug Weiss? Post your comments.

episodes.title: Joni Lamb: In Her Own Words
episodes.description:
"I know now that's why the Lord wanted me to do it." 
That is what Daystar's Joni Lamb said  about a decision she made during a live broadcast of Ministry Now that sent the family into a public tailspin. 

In this newly-released video, Joni Lamb describes hearing from God on multiple occasions regarding her relationship with divorced sex therapist Doug Weiss.

She once again points to the "prophetic voices" that gave her "a word" regarding the romance with Doug Weiss, including Daystar's security guard who had a dream about her new man. What wasn't commonly known prior to this recording is that the security guard is a relative of one of the gals on Joni Table Talk. (Hint: It isn't "Red Wig.")

Joni Lamb's recollection of the meeting she and Jimmy Evans had with Jonathan and Suzy Lamb is a mild version of the July 11, 2023 meeting. The comments in this video are from a recorded conversation five days later.

episodes.title: Daystar Romance: The Timeline
episodes.description:
The whirlwind romance of Daystar's Joni Lamb and divorced marriage/sex therapist Doug Weiss continues to raise eyebrows nearly two years after the wedding.
New questions about an appearance Doug Weiss made on Daystar during his divorce process are creating quite a buzz on social media. He filed for divorce in January 2022, but appeared on Daystar Television Network in April 2022 wearing his wedding ring and talking about his wife and kids. Just two months later, he began a relationship over the phone with the widowed (and wealthy) Joni Lamb.
In this video, we'll take a closer look at the the relationship timeline plus show a clip from the show in question - which Daystar has since deleted.

episodes.title: Marcus Lamb: A Warning Before He Died
episodes.description:
++EXCLUSIVE VIDEO++

"If you want the blessing to continue on your life...on Daystar...you must continuously be lead and guided by by the Holy Spirit."

In this exclusive video, Marcus Lamb speaks about the future of Daystar in April 2021, about seven months before he died. His words carry what could be interpreted as a warning, given the current multi-faceted scandal. 

Marcus Lamb also gives a special blessing over Jonathan in a touching moment between father and son.

Music by https://www.bensound.com
License code: QXB4G98AGUQ4I3LK

episodes.title: The Real Joni Lamb?
episodes.description:
**New Audio** 
Daystar's Joni Lamb repeatedly berates and taunts her son, Jonathan, about not being the head of his household. It is almost as though she is trying to emasculate her own son for not going against his wife, Suzy. 

Joni goes as far as to tell Jonathan that his deceased father, Marcus Lamb, was concerned about his leadership. There is no indication that Marcus ever had those worries or any conversation about it with Jonathan. 


Included in the video are previous clips where Joni Lamb threatens Jonathan and Suzy with demonic activity in their lives if they don’t submit to her. Joni also predicts curses on her own grandchildren because of Jonathan and Suzy’s so-called rebellion.

#TheRealJoniLamb

episodes.title: Joni Lamb Doubles Down at Daystar
episodes.description:
"They're questioning whether I heard from God or not in marrying this man."
Joni Lamb won't budge on her claim that the Lord brought divorced sex therapist Doug Weiss into her life and says she can't work with anyone who doesn't believe her. Ever.

episodes.title: Joni Lamb’s Daughter: "Rebecca is Unhinged"
episodes.description:
Doug Weiss called his soon-to-be stepdaughter "unhinged" because of an outburst Rebecca Lamb Weiss had over his upcoming marriage to her mother, Joni Lamb. 

The comments came during a three-hour meeting between the couple and Jonathan and Suzy Lamb, where concerned were expressed about the upcoming marriage between the recently-divorced sex therapist and Daystar's Joni Lamb.

Also included in the video is an interview from Laura-Lynn Live, which can be viewed in its entirety at this link: 
https://youtube.com/@LauraLynnThompson?si=pFRrVHrRaExYFoZU

episodes.title: Daystar Support: A Spiritual Grand Slam
episodes.description:
Divorced sex therapist Doug Weiss claims that his marriage to Daystar president Joni Lamb had the approval of "world leaders" - an example of a spiritual grand slam of endorsement. 

The comment was made during a three hour meeting in which Jonathan and Suzy Lamb met with the couple and Pastor Jimmy Evans to discuss concerns about the upcoming marriage.

episodes.title: Daystar: Ministry or Mob?
episodes.description:
A tracker was secretly placed in the vehicle of Daystar's vice president followed by a termination letter delivered by an armed security guard. The same security guard who had a "prophetic dream" about the marriage of Joni Lamb and Doug Weiss. 
Now that couple is threatening to cancel "cancel culture" and kill "censorship" while blocking people in droves on social media.
Is this a ministry or a mob?

#DaystarScandal
#MinistryOrMob

episodes.title: Lambasted: Joni Lamb vs. Rodney Howard-Browne
episodes.description: Daystar's Joni Lamb has harsh words for preacher Rodney Howard-Browne. She didn't hold back her criticism even after he gave her $100,000 as a gift. Joni said she used the money to pay for her wedding, even though Rodney opposed the marriage to sex therapist Doug Weiss.

episodes.title: Daughter Rebecca Confronts Joni Lamb
episodes.description:
“She said I had demons and that he cast a spell on me.”
Joni Lamb discloses details about a confrontation with her daughter, Rebecca, who erupted over the relationship with Doug Weiss. 

Rebecca Lamb Weiss has been silent about the multi-tiered scandal at Daystar, but that wasn’t always the case. 

The youngest daughter of the late Marcus Lamb had strong objections about Joni Lamb’s marriage to sex therapist Doug Weiss. 

Joni Lamb describes a confrontation with Rebecca - prior to her wedding - during a secretly-recorded meeting on May 5, 2023.
